title: Batman: Arkham Knight PC Re-release Date Finally Confirmed
text:
Batman: Arkham Knight PC Re-release Date Finally Confirmed 
Published By: EscapistMagazine.com - Yesterday 
Batman: Arkham Knight's woeful PC port will go on sale once again by the end of this month.View Article... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
